title: I got the icon, but no skin. (I already own Riot Kayle)
body: So I received the Poro icon this morning, and so far no sign of the mystery skin gift. I already own Kayle from the good behaviour gift long ago, so what gives?

replies.body: The gifts are actually being sent out separately, so you won't get everything all at once per our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Just hang tight until this is all finished being sent out.  If you already have Riot Kayle then you will[ receive a mystery gift ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you)instead.  You'll get the goods!
